name: 7th International Conference on Civil Engineering, Architecture and Urban Planning Elites
content: This Architecture Conference 2024 which be held on 19-21 July 2024 in Copenhagen, Denmark will explore cutting-edge technology, topics, and methods in the field, as well as dive into the pivotal issues and problems within the scope of such topics as construction management, low-cost housing, power architecture, river mechanics, sustainable architecture, urbanization, and numerous others.
